name: PaperHouse!
description:
You can be anywhere you want with your mind!

You can try to escape from a date that has gone awry.

You can work as a bartender, trying to get rid of patrons right before the bar closes.

You can relax in this bar, trying to understand how you got here or why you are here at all.

You can get into more and more absurd scenarios with no way out.

The most obvious exit may not be the right one!
